title: PM to visit flood-hit Tank, Dera Ismail Khan today
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 02 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will visit the flood-affected southern districts of Khyber Pukhtunkhwa including Tank and Dera Ismail Khan today (Tuesday).
The prime minister will review the ongoing relief work in the flood-affected areas.
Earlier, the prime ministerâ€™s visit to Tank and DI Khan scheduled for Sunday was postponed due to inclement weather.
